mappings.code_logic: Implementing metadata logging for all training data subsets and versioning model weights via DVC (Data Version Control).
Decoupling hardware-specific drivers from application logic using containerized (Docker/Podman) runtime environments.
Replacing probabilistic loops with time-triggered execution to ensure worst-case execution time (WCET) bounds.
Restricting $f(x)$ mapping to local ECU memory; zero-ingress/egress for PII (Personally Identifiable Information).
